name: Data Dog
description:
It's 2054 an age built upon information and system security. The world grinds to a halt while the economy hides from itself and every aspect of our lives becomes monitored or perhaps controlled, only one being remains...transparent. 

Complete quick roguelite  puzzle challenges as Data Dog in this dark digital world!

Created in 48 hours by Theory Georgiou, Brian Shepard & Zweiforce. Honorable Mention for Indie Speed Run 2013 Game Jam.
